name: The Tome of Forgotten Knowledge
description: A worn leather-bound book adorned with strange symbols that seem to shift and writhe in the light, its pages filled with cryptic notes and diagrams from an unknown era.

name: The Whispering Candle
description: A delicate candle etched with a soft, blue-green glow, whose gentle flicker seems to hold a whispered secret that only those attuned can hear.
